description.translate: Neither beauty nor speed are you lacking and for you, none will fade.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Pas de vif argent\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ni beauté, ni célérité ne te manque\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et pour toi, aucune ne s'estompera.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Neither beauty nor speed are you lacking\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and for you, none will fade.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a2 §7SPD§a2\"}"]}}
